Start First graduate students join the Jackson Lab

First graduate students join the Jackson Lab

October, 2021

Seonghwan Kim, Phillip Sin, and Archana Verma join the group as Ph.D students.

October 2021 – Seonghwan Kim, Phillip Sin, and Archana Verma join the group as Ph.D students. Seonghwan comes to us as a MSE Ph.D student from the Seoul National University, and Phillip as a MSE Ph.D student from the Carnegie Mellon University, and Archana as a ChBE Ph.D student from Stanford University.

2021-10-01
